name: Oh Shroom!
description:
Oh Shroom! A Small Mystical Puzzle Adventure!

------

Guide the Shrooms!
Aid the Shrooms of the forest through the dangerous depths of the forest ruins, avoiding the various enemies you may encounter.

Solve The Ancient Puzzles!
Use your fungus brain to solve puzzles with the various Shrooms at your side.

Make your way to the collection rings!

Once enough Shrooms are deposited into the collection portals, jump in yourself! They'll take you to the next level.

------

Controls

(E) Grab Shroom

(Q) Command Shroom (Except those lazy blue ones)

(E (Held)) Throw Shroom (Whilst Held)

 (Left Shift) Sprint

(Left Control) Crouch 

(+/=) Add Mouse Sensitivity

(-) Minus Mouse Sensitivity

Please note,
As the primary target build, the embed web game is significantly more stable than the desktop builds, however lacks in certain shader & post processing effects.

It is therefore recommended to play the embedded web game if possible.
